problem_names:
lemma
  includes applicative_syntax
  shows "const (\<lambda>f x y. f y x) \<diamondop> f \<diamondop> x \<diamondop> y = f \<diamondop> y \<diamondop> x"
translations:
lemma
  includes applicative_syntax
  shows "const (\<lambda>f x y. f y x) \<diamondop> f \<diamondop> x \<diamondop> y = f \<diamondop> y \<diamondop> x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. pure (\<lambda>f x y. f y x) \<diamondop> f \<diamondop> x \<diamondop>
    y =
    f \<diamondop> y \<diamondop> x
